attributes.action: Reduce VAT to help ease the cost of living crisis and strain on normal people
attributes.background: Britons are borrowing more money, with half unable to save at all. UK inflation is rising at a 40-yr record pace and lenders raising mortgage rates. The proportion in financial difficulty is increasing, with spending falling and consumer confidence at a record low. Reduce VAT to help regular people.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623840

If you'd like a different VAT reduction, you could start a new petition explaining how much.
